summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Sixty-third Street to East Sixty-fifth Street, and East Sixty-third Street, from Fourteenth Avenue Northeast to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenance as may be necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district; all in accordance with Resolution No. 2507 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
